content: > the free pattern can be found on our blog click the link above easy fast and textured christmas stocking alpine pattern this crochet stocking pattern is simple yet textured modern and despite looking intricate it is really easy to make i love how one stitch can look different when it is crocheted with different types of yarn or different weights of yarn i have tried the fpcl- front post double_crochet cluster stitch for a hat with hand-dyed yarn before and i was not impressed but while searching for the right stitch to use for my alpine crochet stocking in one of my crochet stitches books- i can say that i love how this stitch worked out with worsted weight yarn materials worsted weight yarn in 2 colors for the sample i used bernat premium in green color and cream color you need 70gr of your main color and 50gr of the color you will make the toes heel and brim hook size 6mm/ us crochet hook size j tapestry needle 1 stitch marker pair of scissors
